column1: Mexico and Poland ended their World Cup Group C match at Stadium 974 in a scoreless draw. Robert Lewandowski had the best opportunity of the game
column2: but his penalty kick was unsuccessful after he was brought down by Hector Moreno. Neither team was able to generate many chances in the attacking third
column3: and the draw was a fair outcome
column4: giving each side one point in their opening match of the tournament.
